page.title: 20 WHITLEY BAY LEISURE POOL
page.content: Whitley Bay Leisure Pool was started in 1972 and in April 1974 it was opened by Alderman Jim Toft.The pool has a wave machine and a 30ft slide.Apart from the pool aspect there is a large cafe upstairs which can be hired out for discos and parties.The Remedial Suite is widely used,it consists of Turkish baths,an Aerotone,Sunbed and Solarium. The opening times for Monday to Friday are 9am - 9pm.Over the weekend it is open from 9am-5pm.For an adult to swim it costs 68p for approximately 1 hour and 35p for a child,under 5 go free. During the years 1983/84 the total number of people swimming at the pool was 239,286, in the years 1984/85 the total number was 358,340, the dramatic increase in swimmers was due to the instalment of the aqua slide.
